articles.title: So sollen russische Schulkinder zu Patrioten gemacht werden
articles.image_title: DIESES FOTO WIRD VON DER RUSSISCHEN STAATSAGENTUR TASS ZUR VERFÜGUNG GESTELLT. [GROZNY, RUSSIA - MAY 25, 2022: Secondary school graduates celebrate the end of the academic year at Secondary School No 18 in Grozny, Chechnya. The traditional ceremony known as "the Last Bell" takes place before seondary school graduates take their final exams. In 2022, Russia's Ministry of Education recommended that Russian schools hold end-of-school ceremonies in person; in 2020 and 2021, these ceremonies were held online due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Yelena Afonina/TASS]

articles.title: Diese Bahnkatastrophe erinnert fatal an das Unglück von Garmisch
articles.image_title: Hatfield rail crash. File photo dated 17/10/2000 of the scene near Hatfield in Hertfordshire after a high speed train derailed. Survivors of the Hatfield rail crash will join those bereaved by the tragedy to mark its 20th anniversary. The four passengers killed when an express train derailed on October 17 2000 will be remembered in a service at St Etheldreda's Church in the Hertfordshire town. Issue date: Saturday October 17, 2020. See PA story RAIL Hatfield. Photo credit should read: Stefan Rousseau/PA Wire URN:56095126
articles.author: Antonia Kleikamp
